column2: "I may not be human, but I have human inclinations. For example, I like to really cut loose and go on a rampage every once in a while."
"But they get mad when I do that here, so I've decided to try it somewhere else."
"Would you care to join me? It feels so good to go on a bloody rampage."
"You just keep shooting and shooting, all the while watching the hostiles dance and suffer. Oh... I'm such a sucker for carnage!"
"The more I talk about it, the more I want to do it. Let's go on the \"Tundra Probe\" mission. Come on, hurry!"
